com.google.android.exoplayer

Interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmoothFrameReleaseTimeHelper
    Enclosing class:
    MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer

    public static interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper
    An interface for fine-grained adjustment of frame release times.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long adjustReleaseTime(long framePresentationTimeUs, long unadjustedReleaseTimeNs)
      Called to make a fine-grained adjustment to a frame release time.
      void disable()
      Disables the helper.
      void enable()
      Enables the helper.

    • Method Detail

      • enable

        void enable()
        Enables the helper.

      • disable

        void disable()
        Disables the helper.

      • adjustReleaseTime

        long adjustReleaseTime(long framePresentationTimeUs,
                     long unadjustedReleaseTimeNs)
        Called to make a fine-grained adjustment to a frame release time.
        Parameters:
        framePresentationTimeUs - The frame's media presentation time, in microseconds.
        unadjustedReleaseTimeNs - The frame's unadjusted release time, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
        Returns:
        An adjusted release time for the frame, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
